VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: memory processing
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids have a limited amount of hard drive space, and once the empty space is depleted, an android will need to enter a reformatting state until enough memory space clears up to continue.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: power
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids require a working reactor to operate. The reactor is not rechargeable, and after it’s spent, a new reactor will need to be installed. Androids without a working reactor will be unable to operate in any capacity.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: joy disabled
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids do not feel joy, and have no need to feel joy.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: beauty disabled
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids do not perceive beauty, and have no need to be surrounded by beauty.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: comfort disabled
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids do not understand comfort, and have no need for it.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: outdoors disabled
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids do not see a difference between indoors and outdoors, and have no need to be outdoors.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: drug desire disabled
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids don’t have a need or desire to consume drugs.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: room size disabled
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids do not care about the size of the room they are in.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: pain disabled
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids do not feel physical pain, and it does not affect them in the slightest.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: synthetic body
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids have a synthetic body constructed out of many biocomponents. Whilst any damage to these parts is permanent, it is not difficult to replace damaged biocomponents with new ones.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: neutro circulation
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids operate thanks to thick neutroamine in their synthetic veins. Due to open, bleeding wounds, neutro loss might occur, greatly affecting the capabilities of an android. They are generally unable to regenerate their neutroamine levels, which means that severe neutroloss needs to be treated in a special casket designed to refill an android with neutroamine.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: synthetic immunity
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids are synthetic in nature, and as such cannot fall ill or suffer from infections of any kind. They will also not suffer from toxic buildup, and are immune to the effects of tox gas, rot gas and polluted environment.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: component freezing
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids do not suffer from hypothermia. Instead, being subjected to very low temperatures may damage biocomponents of an android, which results in the need to replace the damaged parts.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: component overheating
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids do not suffer from heatstroke. Instead, being subjected to very high temperatures will increase the memory processing need, which can eventually lead to the complete loss of control over an android, as it gets locked in a constant reformatting state.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: cold tolerant
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this hardware are much more resistant to cold temperatures.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: heat tolerant
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this hardware are much more resistant to hot temperatures.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: no skill gain
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this hardware are incapable of learning new skills naturally.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: uninspired
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this hardware are incapable of getting inspirations of any kind.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: psychically deaf
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this hardware are deaf to all psychic energy and influence outside their own minds. They cannot be affected by psychic influence, nor can they ever wield psychic power.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: mental breaks disabled
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this hardware do not suffer from any mental breaks that the organics might suffer from - they will never daze, go berserk or give up on the colony.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: psychology disabled
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: text.todo

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: combat incapability
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this subroutine are incapable of harming another being in any way. They will be unable to fight back and hunt.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: solar flare vulnerability
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: During solar flare, all needs of an android become frozen, and the android is unable to move or do any other actions. When the solar flare ends, the android returns to work as normal.
